entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: WNW 35 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
